author: nhcwebmaster@noaa.gov (NHC Webmaster)
nhc_headline: ...HONE TURNS WEST-NORTHWESTWARD TOWARD THE INTERNATIONAL DATE LINE...
summary:
...HONE TURNS WEST-NORTHWESTWARD TOWARD THE INTERNATIONAL DATE LINE...
 As of 8:00 AM HST Sun Sep 1
 the center of Hone was located near 25.3, -178.3
 with movement WNW at 14 mph.
 The minimum central pressure was 1007 mb
 with maximum sustained winds of about 40 mph.

title: Summary - Tropical Storm Hone (CP1/CP012024)
